title: Troubled star Aaron Carter kisses his mum on the lips and calls her 'the love of my life'
text:

Aaron Carter raised a few eyebrows when he locked lips with his mum on the red carpet last night.

The controversial singer, whose antics have been grabbing a lot of headlines recently, took his mother to the premiere of WE's Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars Family Edition.

He could be seen kissing his mother Jane for the photographers, then stroking her face with his hand.

Aaron, 31, told Entertainment Tonight : "This is the love of my life right here".

(Image: Getty Images for WE tv)

(Image: Getty Images)

Getting ready for the glitzy premiere, he posted a photo of himself in his tux, which he captioned: "I’m going to my first prom tonight. Date Night With My Mom."

The former pop star recently congratulated his mum on Instagram for being 40 days sober.

Alongside a photo of Jane, Aaron wrote a lengthy caption which included: "I'm so proud that she is almost 40 days sober and she is truly the love of my life. Momma without you there would be no me."

He added that some of their family members had cut Jane off because of her addiction, but that he understood better than them because he has been to rehab twice.

(Image: Jameson Bedonie / SplashNews.com)

Aaron's brother Nick and twin sister Angel recently announced that they had been forced to file a restraining order against him.

He is no longer allowed within 100 feet of Nick, his family and his home.

Nick, a former Backstreet Boy, wrote: "After careful consideration, my sister Angel and I regret that we were required to seek a restraining order against our brother Aaron today.

"In light of Aaron's increasingly alarming behavior and his recent confession that he harbors thoughts and intentions of killing my pregnant wife and unborn child, we were left with no choice but to take every measure possible to protect ourselves and our family.

"We love our brother and truly hope he gets the proper treatment he needs before any harm comes to himself or anyone else."

(Image: WireImage)

Aaron has denied making the statements and he has told TMZ that he "would never harm his family" and that all he wants is "for them to leave me alone".

Aaron has made shocking claims on Twitter that his sister Leslie, who died in 2012 from a drug overdose, raped him when he was a child.

He has also posted photos of his array of weapons on social media - and he ended up having two rifles confiscated by law enforcement officials.

(Image: aaroncarte /Instagram)

Aaron also got a huge tattoo of mythological Greek monster Medusa on his face.

He posted a photo of the eye popping ink on Instagram, with the caption: "IM THE BIGGEST THING IN MUSIC RIGHT NOW. I CANT BE DENIED. FACT CHECK ME. #unstoppable #LMG #SilenceBreaker".

Aaron recently revealed he's getting treatment from TV psychiatrist Dr. Ish Major and with his help, has given up the sedative drug Xanax.
description: Aaron Carter has kissed his mother on the lips at a film premiere that he described as "date night"
